dd_url.description: Datadog API URL, example: https://api.datadoghq.com, https://api.datadoghq.eu, etc.

dd_api.description: Datadog API key to send metric to Datadog

dd_hostname.description: Hostname that will be used to send metric to datadog. All the metrics will belong to this hostname.

dd_custom_tags.description: Custom tags in format: tag_name=tag_value;tag_name1=tag_value1. Example: department=IT;environment=production;cost_center=123456
